mapper.select: select article.*,articlebody.body,board.cname,p.deleteby,p.deletetime from (select * from deleted order by deleted.deletetime desc limit #{begin},#{count}) p left join (article,articlebody,board) on (board.boardid=p.boardid and p.originid=article.originid and p.boardid=article.boardid and articlebody.articleid=article.articleid);
